content.prompt: The tensions between Russia and Austria-Hungary alluded to by Cartwright were most strongly exacerbated by which of the following?

choices.label: Ideological differences between the two countries’ regimes
Austrian efforts to provoke nationalist unrest among Russia’s ethnic minorities

topic.text: 7.9: Causation in 19th-Century Perspectives and Political Developments

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
